授業目的:
In this course, we will analyse environmental issues around the world. We will focus on how businesses impact the environment (and why many of them destroy the environment in order to increase profits) and how environmental problems, in return, impact businesses.
You will learn about some of the most important environmental issues around the world and how our consumption patterns makes them even bigger problems.
到達目標:
In this course, you will:
- understand major environmental problems and to learn how they impact business
- learn how to think critically
- understand how to give an academic presentation
- improve your discussion skills
授業方法:
The course will be conducted as a seminar, and active student participation is expected.
The zoom URL will be uploaded on LUNA.
Some classes might be provided as on-demand lecture.
